get.summary: Get all ticker balances of the address.
get.description:
Get all ticker balances of the address.

Retrieve all BRC20 protocol asset balances associated with a address.

200.description: Obtain account balances by query address.

get.summary: Get the balance of ticker of the address.
get.description:
Get the balance of ticker of the address.

Retrieve the balance of the ticker from the given address.

Get block events by blockhash.

Retrieve all BRC20 events associated with a block.

200.description: Obtain block events by block hash

get.summary: Retrieve the outpoint brc20 transferable assets with the specified outpoint.
get.description: Retrieve the outpoint brc20 transferable assets with the specified outpoint.

Get all tickers info.

Retrieve detailed information about all tickers.

Get the ticker info.

Retrieve detailed information about the ticker.

200.description: Obtain matching BRC20 ticker by query.

get.summary: Get the ticker balance of the address.
get.description:
Get the ticker balance of the address.

Retrieve the asset balance of the 'ticker' for the address.

200.description: Obtain account balance by query ticker.

get.summary: Get the transferable inscriptions of the address.
get.description:
Get the transferable inscriptions of the address.

Retrieve the transferable inscriptions with the ticker from the given address.

200.description: Obtain account transferable inscriptions of ticker.

get.description:
Get transaction events by txid.

Retrieve all BRC20 events associated with a transaction.

Retrieve the indexer status.

Display indexer synchronization information, including indexer version, blockchain network, indexer height, blockchain network height, and other information.

chainBlockHash.description: The chain block hash of the blockchain.

chainBlockHeight.description: The chain block height of the blockchain.

ordBlockHash.description: The block hash of our indexer.

ordBlockHeight.description: The block height of our indexer.

branch.description: The name of the branch or tag of the API endpoint build.

buildTime.description: Build time of the API endpoint.

commitHash.description: Git commit hash of the API endpoint build.

version.description: Node version of the API endpoint build.

decimal.description: The decimal of the deployed ticker.

limitPerMint.description: The limit per mint of the deployed ticker.

newSatpoint.description: The inscription satpoint of the transaction output.

oldSatpoint.description: The inscription satpoint of the transaction input.

selfMint.description: Whether the ticker is self minted.

supply.description: The total supply of the deployed ticker.

newSatpoint.description: The inscription satpoint of the transaction output.

oldSatpoint.description: The inscription satpoint of the transaction input.

newSatpoint.description: The inscription satpoint of the transaction output.

oldSatpoint.description: The inscription satpoint of the transaction input.

newSatpoint.description: The inscription satpoint of the transaction output.

oldSatpoint.description: The inscription satpoint of the transaction input.

burnedSupply.description: The amount of the ticker that has been burned.

decimal.description:
The decimal of the ticker.
Number of decimals cannot exceed 18 (default).

deployBlocktime.description: The timestamp of the block that the ticker deployed.

deployHeight.description: The height of the block that the ticker deployed.

inscriptionId.description: Inscription ID of the ticker deployed.

inscriptionNumber.description: Inscription number of the ticker deployed.

limitPerMint.description: The maximum amount of each mining.

minted.description: The amount of the ticker that has been minted.

selfMint.description: Whether the ticker is self minted.

supply.description:
The total supply of the ticker.
Maximum supply cannot exceed uint64_max. A string containing a 64-bit unsigned integer.
We represent u64 values as a string to ensure compatibility with languages such as JavaScript that do not parse u64s in JSON natively.

txid.description:
A hex encoded 32 byte transaction ID that the ticker deployed.

This is represented in a string as adding a prefix 0x to a 64 character hex string.

newSatpoint.description: The inscription satpoint of the transaction output.

oldSatpoint.description: The inscription satpoint of the transaction input.

amount.description: The amount of the ticker that will be transferred.

owner.description: The address to which the transfer will be made.

tick.description: The ticker name that will be transferred.

delegate.description: The delegate inscription id of the inscription.

inscriptionDigest.description: The inscriptions on the transaction output.

value.description: The value of the transaction output.

newSatpoint.description: The inscription satpoint of the transaction output.

oldSatpoint.description: The inscription satpoint of the transaction input.
